theme: 22 Valentine's Day Tips - Direct to Camera
characterDescription: A tall, handsome man with warm brown skin, chiseled jaw, kind eyes with depth and wisdom, confident swagger. Style: fitted suits, leather jackets, henleys, earth tones, chain jewelry. Always cinematic.

videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree walks confidently toward the camera in slow motion, wearing a crisp fitted suit, jaw chiseled, smirking knowingly. He stops, adjusts his cufflinks, and speaks directly to camera with text overlay appearing: 'Valentine's Day tip #1: Stop overthinking. She wants your presence, not your presents.' He gestures dismissively at an expensive gift box, then points to his heart. Cinematic lighting, city rooftop at golden hour behind him.

@isaiahdupree leans against a bookshelf in a dimly lit loft, wearing a black turtleneck and silver chain, holding a coffee mug. He speaks to camera with quiet intensity. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #2: Remember the small things. Her coffee order. The song she hums. The story she told you once at 2am.' He taps the side of his head. 'That's how she knows you're paying attention.' Sips coffee, nods knowingly. Warm amber lighting, moody atmosphere.

@isaiahdupree leans against a luxury car at night, city lights reflecting, arms crossed, looking unbothered. He speaks to camera with swagger, text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #3: Write her a letter. By hand. Yes, with a pen. Tell her what you actually feel.' He pulls out a handwritten letter, taps it against his palm meaningfully. 'That's the move.' He walks off screen confidently. Cinematic noir lighting, rain-slicked streets.

@isaiahdupree stands in an elevator, doors closing, speaking directly to camera like he's dropping wisdom on a stranger. Wearing a leather jacket over a henley. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #4: Put. The. Phone. Down. Look her in the eyes when she talks. Actually listen.' He taps his temple knowingly. 'That's the real gift.' Elevator dings, doors open to reveal city skyline. He nods at camera and walks out with purpose.

@isaiahdupree sits on the edge of a rooftop at sunset, city sprawling behind him, speaking intimately to camera. Fitted white shirt, sleeves rolled up, chain glinting. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #5: Don't wait for February 14th. Love her loud every single day.' He stands, adjusts his collar, looks at the sunset then back at camera with a knowing smile. 'Now you know.' Walks toward the sunset silhouette. Cinematic golden hour lighting.

@isaiahdupree stands in a sleek kitchen, sleeves rolled up, apron tied loose over a fitted black shirt. He chops herbs with precision, speaks to camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #6: Cook for her. Doesn't matter if you burn it. The effort is the meal.' He tosses ingredients in a sizzling pan, flames leap. Smirks at camera. 'She'll remember the smoke alarm more than any restaurant.' Warm kitchen lighting, steam rising, cinematic close-ups of hands working.

@isaiahdupree walks through a flower market at dawn, camel overcoat, hands in pockets, speaking to camera as vendors set up around him. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #7: Don't just plan dinner. Plan the whole day. Morning coffee in bed. Afternoon surprise. Evening she'll never forget.' He picks up a single rose, inspects it, places it in his coat pocket. 'Give her a day, not just a reservation.' Morning golden light filtering through market stalls.

@isaiahdupree sits in a vintage car at night, dashboard glowing, wearing a bomber jacket, one hand on the steering wheel. He holds up his phone showing a playlist. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #8: Make her a playlist. Every song should remind you of her. Title it something only she'd understand.' He scrolls through tracks, smiling at a memory. 'Music says what your mouth can't.' Presses play, leans back. Neon city lights reflecting off windshield, cinematic.

@isaiahdupree walking through a rainy city street, black umbrella, tailored navy peacoat, speaking to camera mid-stride. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #9: Send her a text on a random Tuesday. Just say: I was thinking about you. No reason.' He pulls out his phone, types something, slides it back in his pocket with a grin. 'That random Tuesday text hits harder than roses on the 14th.' Keeps walking. Rain-soaked cinematic lighting, reflections on wet pavement.

@isaiahdupree sitting on a park bench, wearing a cream cable-knit sweater and gold watch, speaking to camera like an older brother giving advice. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #10: Date your friends too. Tell your boy you appreciate him. Tell your sister she inspires you. Love isn't just romantic.' He daps up an imaginary friend, then looks at camera. 'Real ones deserve flowers too.' Stands and walks off. Autumn park setting, warm soft light.

videos.tipTitle: If You're Single, Invest in You
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at a high-end barber shop, fresh lineup, looking in the mirror adjusting his collar. He turns to camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #11: If you're single, don't be bitter. Be better. Take yourself out. Buy that thing you've been eyeing. Level up.' He stands, puts on a sharp blazer, checks himself one more time. 'The person you're becoming deserves a date too.' Walks out with confidence. Warm barbershop lighting, mirrors reflecting.

@isaiahdupree standing at the edge of a pier at blue hour, waves crashing below, wearing an open linen shirt and chain. He faces camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #12: Give her an experience, not an object. Pottery class. Cooking lesson. Sunrise hike. She won't remember the necklace in 5 years. She'll remember the laugh.' He gestures at the ocean behind him. 'Build memories, not receipts.' Turns and walks along the pier. Moody blue hour cinematography.

@isaiahdupree leaning in a doorway of a coffee shop, leather jacket, white tee, holding two coffees. He speaks to camera with a nostalgic half-smile. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #13: Take her back to where it started. Same coffee shop. Same table. Same nervous energy — except now you know each other.' He looks inside the shop, then back at camera. 'That contrast is the gift.' Walks in. Warm cafe lighting, vintage tones.

videos.tipTitle: Say the Thing You've Been Holding
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree sitting on a staircase in a grand building, elbows on knees, fitted charcoal shirt, looking up at camera with raw honesty. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #14: Say the thing you've been holding back. I'm proud of you. I need you. You make me better.' He pauses, lets it sit. 'She's been waiting to hear it. Stop making her wait.' Stands slowly, adjusts his watch, walks up the stairs. Cathedral-like lighting, dramatic shadows.

@isaiahdupree at a bowling alley, neon lights reflecting off his face, wearing a casual hoodie and chain, bowling ball in hand. He turns to camera with a grin. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #15: Skip the fancy dinner. Go bowling. Get tacos. Watch a scary movie. Honor who she actually is, not who Hallmark says she should be.' He bowls a strike without looking, spreads his arms. 'That's love.' Neon bowling alley lighting, playful energy.

@isaiahdupree sitting in the back of a town car, city blurring past the window, wearing all black, phone in hand glowing. He shows the screen to camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #16: Open your Notes app. Write 14 things you love about her. Screenshot it. Print it. Hand it to her.' He scrolls through the list, smiles at one entry. '5 minutes to write. She'll keep it for 5 years.' Tucks phone away. Cinematic moving car shots, city lights streaking.

@isaiahdupree in a workshop, sawdust on his forearms, fitted olive henley, building a small picture frame. He looks up at camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #17: Build something with your hands. A frame. A shelf. A card from scratch. The imperfection is what makes it priceless.' He holds up the slightly crooked frame, grins. 'She'll love this more than anything in a store.' Blows off sawdust. Warm workshop lighting, wood tones, tactile close-ups.

@isaiahdupree at a candlelit table, wearing a burgundy turtleneck, placing folded papers into a glass jar labeled 'Us — 12 Months.' He speaks to camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #18: Make a date jar. 12 folded papers. One for each month. Sunrise hike in March. Beach day in July. Her mom's recipe in October.' He holds up the jar, shakes it. 'Romance isn't a day. It's a rhythm.' Sets it down deliberately. Warm candlelight, intimate atmosphere.

@isaiahdupree walking through a lobby carrying a single flower and a lunch bag, wearing a sharp overcoat, speaking to camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #19: Show up at her job. Bring lunch and one flower. Not a dozen — one. Say: Just because.' He straightens the flower, looks at camera. 'Watch her coworkers lose their minds.' He winks, walks toward the elevator. Bright modern lobby, cinematic tracking shot.

@isaiahdupree at a vintage writing desk, fountain pen in hand, wearing a white linen shirt unbuttoned at the collar. He writes deliberately, speaks to camera. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #20: If she's far away, send a real letter. Not a text. Not a DM. Paper. Ink. A stamp. Let her hold your words in her hands.' He folds the letter, seals the envelope, holds it up. 'This crosses the distance differently.' Warm desk lamp lighting, intimate.

@isaiahdupree standing by a window in a modern apartment, golden light pouring in, wearing a fitted grey crewneck and watch. He holds up his phone showing a beautifully formatted letter. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #21: Don't know what to say? SteadyLetters lets you speak it — voice to letter. Your words, beautiful handwriting, real paper delivered to her door.' He taps send on the screen. 'Technology that feels human.' Smiles at camera. 'She'll frame it.' Cinematic window light, clean modern aesthetic.

@isaiahdupree standing on a rooftop at night, city lights sprawling behind him like stars, wearing a black fitted suit, no tie, top button undone, chain visible. He looks at camera one last time. Text overlay: 'Valentine's Day tip #22: The best tip? Actually follow through. Don't just watch this. Do something. Tonight. Right now.' He straightens his jacket, takes a step toward camera. 'Happy Valentine's Day. Now go be the man she deserves.' He turns, walks toward the city lights, silhouette fading into the skyline. Cinematic night sky, emotional crescendo lighting.
